headline: Citi drops firearms restriction in a bow to conservative pressure
summary: The bank updated a 7-year-old policy, enacted after the Parkland school shooting, over concerns about “fair access” months after Republicans accused some institutions of political de-banking.

headline: Tariff-Resistant US Economy Soothes Traders Ahead of Jobs Data
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Options traders are betting the S&P 500 Index will post its smallest swing in months following Friday’s US employment report, highlighting how a spate of better-than-expected data has calmed investor worries over the economic impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs. headline: Citi to end policy restricting services to retail clients selling firearms in effort to ensure 'fair access'
